availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Woodard German (Louisville, Kentucky agent and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, agent and soldier. Ohio native. Served in McLaughlin's Squadron Ohio Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private. Served in the 45th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A) as second lieutenant from August 18, 1863, to December 24, 1864. Agent in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Ohio, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M552, Roll 0038.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 436.
Louisville, Kentucky, City Directory, 1865 Ancestry.com, U.S. City Directories 1822-1995, p. 316.
